API-ENDPOINT.md.content:
# API Endpoint Documentation

## `POST /api/v1/users`

Creates a new user account.

### Request Headers

| Header | Required | Description |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| `Authorization` | Yes | Bearer token |
| `Content-Type` | Yes | `application/json` |

### Request Body

```json
{
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "password": "securePassword123",
  "name": "John Doe"
}
```

### Response

#### Success (201 Created)

```json
{
  "id": "usr_123abc",
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "name": "John Doe",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z"
}
```

#### Error (400 Bad Request)

```json
{
  "error": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
  "message": "Email already exists",
  "details": {
    "field": "email"
  }
}
```

### Example

```bash
curl -X POST https://api.example.com/api/v1/users \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email":"user@example.com","password":"pass123","name":"John"}'
```

CHANGELOG.md.content:
# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

### Added
- New feature X for improved performance

### Changed
- Updated dependency Y to version 2.0

## [1.2.0] - 2024-01-15

### Added
- User authentication via OAuth 2.0
- Dark mode support
- Export functionality for reports

### Changed
- Improved error messages for API responses
- Migrated database to PostgreSQL

### Fixed
- Memory leak in image processing module
- Timezone handling for scheduled tasks

### Security
- Updated crypto library to patch CVE-2024-XXXX

## [1.1.0] - 2024-01-01

### Added
- Initial public release
- Basic CRUD operations
- REST API endpoints

[Unreleased]: https://github.com/user/repo/compare/v1.2.0...HEAD
[1.2.0]: https://github.com/user/repo/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0
[1.1.0]: https://github.com/user/repo/releases/tag/v1.1.0
